project_abstract.cdata: The project includes: (A) Procurement of: (i) equipment for the construction and upgrading of access and feeder roads; (ii) equipment for log extraction, opening of skid-tracks, including spares for existing equipment; (iii) loading/unloading equipment, trucks for road haulage and tugs for river transportation of log rafts including spares for existing equipment; and (iv) inspection vehicles and trucks for the Forest Department; (B) buildings for project headquarters at Prome, a central store and workshop; supervision vehicles; workshop machinery; research materials and office equipment; (C) minor rehabilitation of selected sawmills; (D) training overseas of key TC personnel and provision of five specialists; (E) feasibility studies of future development projects in the forestry sector.
